From the last Tuesday, Investors invested more than $4.5 BILLION in just 10 companies...

Here is 5 of them:

Artemis Gold, $360,000,000, Post-IPO Debt

Luna Foundation Guard, $1,000,000,000, Initial Coin Offering

Bedrock Real Estate Services, $430,000,000, Debt Financing

Hozon, $315,347,986, Series D

TierPoint, $500,000,000, Private Equity

If you're interested in receiving top 10 investments every week, you can just subscribe below: https://startupref.com/weekly-top-investments
stories.title: Weekly top investments – More than $4.5B

stories.text:
I am wondering what would be the impact of having sites worldwide present specific informational pages to requests originating from Russia?

It could be a way to provide information about the actions of their government to the Russian population, whose main source of information is basically propaganda, as there are almost no alternatives? (Russia ranks close to the bottom of the Press Freedom Index).

Something that remains factual, why most of the world is sanctioning Russia, what is impacted, what are the casualties of war so far, etc.
stories.title: Would it be helpful for websites to geofence Russia?
